chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeris M Moore

records.addlTxt: Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Jeris M Moore in court, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter in court for Jeris M Moore.  Attorney Jessica Bellows in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Discovery and offer received.  Defense needs to review discovery with client and has hired an investigator.  Defense request another scheduling conference.

Court denies the request and orders case set for Final Pretrial and Jury trial.

State's offer remains till the final pretrial.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 30, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jeris M Moore not in court, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter in court for Jeris M Moore.  Attorney Jessica Bellows in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant's appearance is waived.  Defense has received discovery and offer received. Defense needs to review offer with the defendant and request an adjourned hearing.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Order Permitting Review of digital disccovery at Milwaukee County Jail, signed and filed.
Order Permitting Review of digital discovery at Milwaukee County Jail, received and filed.

MOTION N REQUESTING INMATE REVIEW OF DIGITAL DISCOVERY AT MILWAUKEE
COUNTY JAIL, received and filed.

Defendant Jeris M Moore in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Defendant Jeris M Moore in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Discovery and offer received.  Defense has not reviewed all discovery yet.  Copy sent to client, but has not recieved it.  Defense is requesting an additional extension of 30 days to complete total review discovery.  Defense anticipates hiring an investigator.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Borowski.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Watts, Br. 15.

Defendant Jeris M Moore in court with Attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Defendant Jeris M Moore in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer M. Walker. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15.   
*Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04B (Amended), parties are hereby advised: Effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Branch 6, Judge Ellen R. Brostrom, in Room 506 of the Safety Building.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jeris M Moore not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Attorney Ritter in trial in a diffrent county this week. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Retainer.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Jeris M Moore in court, in custody.  Annie Louk appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for preliminary hearing. State witness present. Defendant need more time to appoint Private counsel.
 Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jeris M Moore in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Jeris M Moore in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jeris M Moore appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4). This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with JAJ and BLA
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
